metadata.title: CVE-2020-25741 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: fdctrl_write_data in hw/block/fdc.c in QEMU 5.0.0 has a NULL pointer dereference via a NULL block pointer for the current drive.

advisory.discovered_by: Sergej Schumilo, Cornelius Aschermann, Simon Wrner

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-01-05, the proposed patch has not been commited upstream

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
